FabricException FabricException Class

In this Article

Edit

The exception that is thrown for Service Fabric error code.

Syntax

Declaration

[Serializable]
public class FabricException : Exception, ISerializable, _Exception<Serializable>

    Implements ISerializable, _Exception

Remarks

Defines an error code property that is used to indicate the precise circumstance that produced the exception.
